entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
